divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a white light in sky that i thought was a star or planet when it slowly started moving toward the north then sped up and out of sight.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fox Lake
There were no other sightings in Fox Lake on or around August 7th 2013
Summary: Saw what I thought was star or planet when it started moving then shot out of site toward the north.
